import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { ChatOutput } from "./ChatOutput"; export const Chat = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState(""); const [chatOutput, setChatOutput] = useState([]); async function SubmitHandler(event) { event.preventDefault(); setChatOutput([ ...chatOutput, { userInput: input, serverResponse: "loading" }, ]); setInput(""); const response = await axios.get("https://catfact.ninja/fact?max_length=140"); setChatOutput((prevChatOutput) => { const updatedChatOutput = [...prevChatOutput]; const loadingIndex = updatedChatOutput.findIndex( (message) => message.serverResponse === "loading" ); if (loadingIndex !== -1) { updatedChatOutput[loadingIndex].serverResponse = response.data.fact; } return updatedChatOutput; }); } return (
Anderson Vanhron
Junior Developer
{/*
Can be verified on any platform using docker
Your error message says permission denied, npm global installs must be given root privileges.
*/} {chatOutput.map((message, index) => ( ))}
) }
